title: Voters Are Turning Out | Guests: Salena Zito & Mercedes Schlapp | 11/2/20
description:
A Catholic archbishop wrote a letter to President Trump warning about the Great Reset. Glenn takes calls from viewers who are first-time Trump voters, non-voters, or undecided. Leaked audio reportedly from leftist groups reveals their plan for post-election chaos in the streets. Reporter Salena Zito calls in to discuss the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette editorial board backing President Trump. Glenn and Stu discuss what states Trump needs to win and the importance of the Senate races. Trump campaign senior adviser Mercedes Schlapp portrays a side of Trump the media pretends doesn’t exist. Economist Stephen Moore discusses the amazing economic comeback from the coronavirus lockdowns and his predictions for election night.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: As record numbers of early voters turn out, Glenn takes calls from viewers who are first-time Trump voters, non-voters, or undecided.
